titleStmt.title: A supplement to the treatise of watch & clock-work called The artificial clock-maker ... by W.D., M.A.
titleStmt.author: Derham, W. (William), 1657-1735.

biblFull.extent: 28, [2] p., [6] folded leaves of plates : ill.

notesStmt.note: "Wherein is contain'd, 1. The anatomy of a watch and clock, 2. Monsieur Romer's satellite-instrument : with observation concerning the calculation of the eclipses of Jupiter's satellites, and to find the longitude by them, 3. A nice way to correct pendulum watches, 4. Mr. Flamsteed's equation tables, 5. To find a meridian-line for the governing of watches, and other uses, 6. To make a telescope to keep a watch by the fixed stars."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
